value.stringValue: Waiting for KYC to send to legal approval

decisions.name: Validate_Change_Risk_Final_Edit_Fields
decisions.label: Validate Change Risk Final / Edit Fields

decisions.name: Was_RCC_already_sent_to_approval
decisions.label: Was RCC already sent to approval

formulas.name: pontuacaoFormula
formulas.expression: ( {!segmentRiskFormula} ) * ( CASE({!Question3}, {!Sim}, 1, {!Nao}, 5, {!Em_Partes}, 2, 0) + CASE({!Question4}, {!Sim}, 1, {!Nao}, 5, {!Em_Partes}, 2, 0) + CASE({!Question5}, {!Sim}, 1, {!Nao}, 5, {!Em_Partes}, 2, 0) + CASE({!Question6}, {!Sim}, 1, {!Nao}, 5, {!Em_Partes}, 2, 0) + CASE({!Question7}, {!Sim}, 1, {!Nao}, 5, {!Em_Partes}, 2, 0) + CASE({!Question8}, {!Sim}, 1, {!Nao}, 5, {!Em_Partes}, 2, 0) )

formulas.name: revisaoFormula
formulas.expression: CASE( {!Risco_Final}, "Low", "1 Year", "Medium", "6 Months", "High", "3 Months", "Extreme", "1 Month", "No review yet" )

formulas.name: segmentRiskFormula
formulas.expression: CASE( {!Get_Opportunity.Segmento__c}, "Acessórios", 2, "Conteúdo Adulto", 150, "Bares e Restaurantes", 2, "Bebidas", 1, "Vestuário", 2, "Construção civil", 2, "Cosméticos", 2, "Criptomoedas", 150, "Decoração", 2, "Digital", 1, "Dropshipping", 2, "Educação", 1, "E-learning", 1, "Eletronics", 5, "Eventos", 150, "Alimentos", 1, "Food & Beverage", 1, "Calçados", 1, "Móveis e/ou eletrodomésticos", 2, "Jogos de azar e apostas", 150, "Gaming", 2, "Grocery", 1, "Home Appliances", 2, "Hotéis", 5, "Joias/Relógios", 2, "Marketplace", 2, "PSP", 2, "Pet", 1, "Restaurantes", 1, "Sexshop", 1, "Software/Saas B2B", 1, "Papelaria", 1, "Suplementos/Farmacêuticos", 2, "Integrador Técnico", 1, "Turismo", 5, "Outros", 5, 0 )

recordUpdates.name: Updating_RCC_Legal_Approval_Status_on_Opportunity
recordUpdates.label: Updating RCC Legal Approval Status on Opportunity

fields.name: RCC_Form_Title

fields.fieldText: Segment Risk

fields.fieldText: Form

fields.name: Question1
fields.fieldText: How is the merchant's demand generated?

fields.name: Question3
fields.fieldText: Is the description of the product/service sent or made avaiable clear?

fields.name: Question5
fields.fieldText: Any activity carried out with products/services restricted by PagBrasil's policies?

fields.name: Question7
fields.fieldText: Does the merchant have a good reputation in the market?

fields.name: ReclameAqui_URL
fields.fieldText: ReclameAqui URL

fields.name: Question_9
fields.fieldText: Who was the negotiation with?

fields.name: Question2
fields.fieldText: How will the sales forecast be achieved?

fields.name: Question4
fields.fieldText: Can the product/services be considered of good quality?

fields.name: Question6
fields.fieldText: Does the merchant already have a presence in the market?

fields.name: Question8
fields.fieldText: Is the expected sales forecast realistic for this product/service category?

fields.name: Question10
fields.fieldText: How was the ID Check conducted with the legal representative?

fields.name: Social_media_URL
fields.fieldText: Social media URL

fields.name: Question11
fields.fieldText: Do we have direct contact or was the legal representative's business email provided during KYC?
